creditline: Gift of Mrs. Eugene J. Carpenter and Olivia Carpenter Coan in memory of Mr. Eugene J. Carpenter
description: card table, square, folding with corners shaped into round plates for candles. Hinged backed with stay; cabriole legs with weak claw and ball foot in front and pad feet in back; the knees are carved with a shell motif, and a simple scrolling on the inner knee forms the ear; top covered with green felt
title: Card table
